job.title: Systems Engineer - Data Modeling / Date Mapping

capability integrator and transformative enterprise IT provider we deliver trusted and highly differentiated national security solutions and technologies that keep people safe and secure Peraton analysis to support application of data standards across the enterprise Duties require a broad range of knowledge including information technology requirements technical architecture analysis eg Agile Scrum amp Kanban etcliliPossessing an instinctive aptitude to leverage information and knowledge sharing networks and navigate conflict in a way that fosters constructive outcomesbrliulThe can produce outputs to support multiple system architectures This includes systems and data architecture and integration data modeling and data mapping in direct support of enterprise technology
